summary: An email from attorney Sigrid McCawley providing links to sealed deposition videos in the Giuffre v. Maxwell case, in response to a grand jury subpoena. The list includes deposition dates and names of deponents, including key figures Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: McCawley, as an attorney, is involved in the legal proceedings (Giuffre v. Maxwell) where Maxwell is a defendant, and is providing access to Maxwell's deposition videos.
Both are key accused figures in the case, and their deposition videos are listed in the same document related to the grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Sealed Grand Jury Subpoena Order
events.description: Reference to a sealed order related to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Email Transmission of Deposition Links
events.description: Attorney Sigrid McCawley sends an email containing links to sealed deposition videos in response to a grand jury subpoena.

keyFacts: The document is an email from attorney Sigrid McCawley providing password-protected links to sealed deposition videos for a grand jury subpoena in Giuffre v. Maxwell.
The deposition list includes key figures Ghislaine Maxwell (deposed 4/22/2016 and 7/22/2016) and Jeffrey Epstein (deposed 9/9/2016).
Other listed deponents include Brittany Henderson, Peter Kent, Frederick M. Miller, Phillip W. Esplin, and Gregory B. Taylor, suggesting a range of witnesses were deposed.
The document references a sealed grand jury subpoena order dated April 9, 2019, indicating ongoing grand jury proceedings related to the case.
The email is marked as confidential attorney-client communication, highlighting the sensitive nature of the deposition materials.
